segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and I’m worried someone is going to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying that plate, completely unaware of the danger around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and I’m terrified he’s going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it’s scary how unaware she is of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more slippery, and I’m afraid someone is going to get hurt if they don’t clean it up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and I think the boy is going to regret taking so many if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, everything is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is still reaching for more cookies, and I’m afraid he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR
